aboutSection.title: Innovative data solution for M&A professionals

opportunities.headline: 3.5 T USD
opportunities.description: The known Value of all Transactions
Of Value Increase in South East Asia

coreFeature.title: Data Aggregation
coreFeature.description: M&A Compass gathers critical intelligence about buyers, sellers, investors and relevant deals for any given industry no matter how niche. It understands the drivers of M&A strategies and identifies disrupting and emerging industry trends for multitude of target markets:  Investment Banks, Private Equity Firms, Corporate M&A Functions, and Consultancy Firms.

firstFeature.title: Data Analytics
firstFeature.description: The M&A Compass applies Big Data, Text Mining and NLP to published and open sources to capture the 'lost' intelligence about planned  acquisitions, divestments and M&A strategies.

secondFeature.title: Knowledge Graph
secondFeature.description: Revolutionary graph database unveils disparate sets of data, typically stored in separate data silos, thereby allowing faster information retrieval and insight discovery.
